name: Werewolf Simulator Adventure
description:
Be the first to play the game everyone will be talking about. Part adventure, part treasure hunt, part smash and dash. This game has all the features of you would expect from a Werewolf Simulator - blood and guts, smashing walls, destroying the medieval village - but also fun elements you would find in a treasure hunt or maze type of game.

Features:
--Control a Huge Werewolf (Half Man / Half Wolf) also known as a Lycanthrope
--4 Fun and Interactive Maps
--Shark appear in the Second levels
--Smash as many objects as possible to get the highest score
--High Quality graphics in a Medieval setting

The goal is to find all the coins before the time expires. You get extra time for each heart you find. Or, you may choose to play for the high score.

**Note** This game pushes the limits of current mobile devices. If you are trying to play this on an iPod touch 4G, it will perform very poorly. Have fun playing!
